response.original_title: Lost Treasures of the Ancient World: The Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
response.overview: This program presents the stories of the works of architecture regarded by the Greeks and Romans as the most extraordinary structures of antiquity: the Hanging Gardens of Babylon, The Statute Of Zeus, the Temple of Artemis, the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus, the Pharos of Alexandria and the Pyramids of Egypt and more.
response.title: Lost Treasures of the Ancient World: The Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
